cheat.description: Infinite Time
P1 Just 2 Pieces to make a Trap
P1 Just 2 Pieces to make a Mine
P1 Just 2 Pieces to make a Drone
P1 Just 2 Pieces to make a Spazzmatazz
P1 Just 2 Pieces to make a QTPI
P1 Can Never Make a Trap
P1 Can Never Make a Mine
P1 Can Never Make a Drone
P1 Can Never Make a Spazzmatazz
P1 Can Never Make a QTPI
P2 is for an actual P2 not the CPU

P2 Just 2 Pieces to make a Spazzmatazz
P2 Just 2 Pieces to make a QTPI

P2 Can Never Make a Spazzmatazz
